GenericErrorMessage: There was an error processing the request. Please try again later.
OptionAlwaysPlaySubtitlesHelp: Subtitles matching the language preference will be loaded regardless of the audio language.
OptionNoSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles will not be loaded by default.
OptionDefaultSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles are loaded based on the default and forced flags in the embedded metadata. Language preferences are considered when multiple options are available.
OptionSmartSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles matching the language preference will be loaded when the audio is in a foreign language.
PlayDefaultAudioTrack: Play default audio track regardless of language
OptionOnlyForcedSubtitlesHelp: Only subtitles marked as forced will be loaded.
EmbyIntroMessage: Med Emby kan du enkelt streama video, musik och bilder till smarta mobiler, surfplattor och andra enheter från din Emby Server.
LabelEnterConnectUserNameHelp: Detta är ditt Emby online kontos användarnamn eller e-post
MessageInvalidUser: Ogiltigt användarnamn eller lösenord. Var god försök igen.
MessageUnableToConnectToServer: Vi kunde inte upprätta anslutning till vald server just nu. Försäkra dig om att den är påslagen och försök igen.
ConnectLoginHelp1: With Emby Connect you can easily access your Emby Server wherever you are and share servers with your family and friends.
CreatePinErrorMessage: An error occurred while creating a pin code. Please click Generate New Pin to try again.
PinExpiredMessage: The pin code has expired. Please click Generate New Pin to try again.
ConnectPinCodeHeader: To sign in with Emby Connect, visit {0} and enter the following pin code:
LocalPinCodeHeader: To sign in, visit {0} and enter the following pin code:
ServerUpdateNeeded: This Emby Server needs to be updated. To download the latest version, please visit {0}
LocalPinCodeTip: {0}Tip:{1} You can also use the Emby web app, Android, or iOS. Click your user icon in the upper right, then click {0}Enter Pin Code.{1}
